articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Apartment Houses for University Educators
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Apartment Houses for University Educators
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), gave field guidance to the construction site of apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology near completion.
					 Watching the skyscraping apartment houses of a sailing ship style, he said that they look very nice as their outer walls are decorated with tiles. He  expressed great satisfaction, noting that they are the structures which reflect the WPK's  idea of attaching importance to science and talents and the ones to which formative art of architecture has been fully applied and monumental edifices demonstrating the daily developing architecture of Songun Korea before the whole world.
					
					 He said, his face beaming with a broad smile, that they look more attractive when their outer walls are covered with heated reflection glass as required by the design, adding that he felt relieved of long fatigue when thinking that educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology would be provided with the apartment houses to be proud of before the world before long.
					
					 Going round flat No.1 on the fourth floor of block No. 2, shop and restaurant and other service facilities being built on the ground floor of the apartment houses, he learned in detail about the construction.
					
					 Dropping in at various rooms including drawing room, couple room, kitchen and study, he looked at the surface of wall and floor with attention and highly appreciated the quality of construction. Seeing an arch like pillar of the entrance between corridor and drawing room, he said that it would look peculiar when it was fitted with decorative board.
					
					 Underscoring the need to furnish the flat with every trifling thing necessary for living, he told officials to let the educators devote themselves to the work for training talents and scientific and researches without any inconvenience in their living.
					
					 Pleased that the service facilities including shop and restaurant are under construction as required by the design, he  instructed  officials of the unit which would operate them to come out to check and make advance preparations for providing service when the apartment houses are completed.
					
					 He underlined the need to simultaneously push forward the arrangement of environment including greening work as the day of completion of the project is drawing near.
					
					 Saying that the longer one watches the apartment houses for educators of Kim Chaek University of Technology, the more fashionable they look and they will appear more attractive when one watches them from the opposite side of the Taedong River, he stressed that the structures which are suited to the modern architectural beauty and which meet the requirements of the Juche and national characters, originality and convenience have appeared in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 He highly praised the soldier-builders at the construction site for doing their work well as a model unit in the nation's construction in hearty response to the call of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 Saying that it is the pride of the WPK and the country to have KPA Unit 267 which rushes to wherever the party calls it to work and devotedly implements the task in the best quality by the fixed date, he gave it the highest appreciation, calling its service personnel modern day Chollima riders racing against time in ushering in a great heyday of building a rich and powerful country.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Army Lieut. General Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the National Defence Commission.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Sites of Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage Again
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Construction Sites of Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage Again
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, provided field guidance to the construction sites of Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage again.
					 Looking round various places of the construction sites, he learned in detail about their construction.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the frame projects were completed and the interior construction is also close to completion thanks to the devoted efforts of the soldier-builders though it was not long since the project started.
					
					 He said that what pleased him, in particular, in the construction of the two buildings was that the party's policy of preserving the originality by avoiding repetition and ready-made formula in architecture is being thoroughly implemented.
					
					 "The park being built in the compound of the baby home and orphanage looks peculiar and nice, indeed, and a child-care room, education room, amusement room, intelligence game room, treatment room, etc. have been distributed in such a manner as to be convenient for child care, education and living and their construction is very high in quality", he said.
					
					 Noting that not only a physical exercise room but outdoor and indoor wading pools are being built to meet the requirements of the children's growth, he said children would like them very much when they are completed.
					
					 He instructed officials to decorate the interior of the buildings to suit children's minds.
					
					 He underlined the need to build well all playgrounds and living places including the park to help develop the intellectual faculties of the children and let them have good moral virtues.
					
					 He repeatedly told officials to construct well the baby home and orphanage located in the best places so that they may fully demonstrate the party's love for the rising generation and the future and the superiority of the socialist system in the country.
					
					 He said that it is the intention of the Party Central Committee to build well baby homes and orphanages like Pyongyang Baby Home and Orphanage in each province in the future so that the orphans can stoutly grow up, receiving the best education under the best living conditions.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the KPA General Political Bureau, Han Kwang Sang, department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Army Lieut. General Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the Natioal Defence Commission.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Russian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulatory Message to Russian President
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a congratulatory message to V.V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on August 13.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm and friendly greetings to you and, through you, to the people of your country on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 The history and tradition of the DPRK-Russia friendship which were provided in the flames of the grim anti-Japanese war and given a steady continuity for decades are steadily developing in depth in conformity with the aspiration and desire of the two peoples.
					
					 Convinced that the friendly and cooperative relations between our two countries will grow stronger in various fields in the spirit of the joint documents agreed upon at the highest level, I wish you greater success in your responsible work to build rich and strong Russia.

articles.title: Command of Southwestern Front of KPA Blasts S. Korean Military for Shelling Peaceable Fishing Boats of DPRK
articles.content:
Command of Southwestern Front of KPA Blasts S. Korean Military for Shelling Peaceable Fishing Boats of DPRK
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The command of the southwestern front of the Korean People's Army (KPA) released the following report Wednesday:
					 The south Korean military hooligans committed such a serious military provocation as indiscriminately shelling peaceable fishing boats of the DPRK engaged in their routine fishing operations in the waters off the southwestern coast on Tuesday.
					
					 This reckless provocation has pushed the already tense situation in the waters to an unpredictable phase of explosion.
					
					 The gravity of the situation lies in that this military provocation was perpetrated under a carefully worked out premeditated plan.
					
					 The units of the three services of the puppet forces were put on alert and F-16 fighter bombers hovered in the sky above the waters while five speed boats intruded deep into the territorial waters of the DPRK in succession to indiscriminately fire shells at the peaceable boats. This was truth about the recent provocation.
					
					 The officers and men of the KPA on the southwestern front were already well aware of the despicable true nature of the military gangsters who committed such provocation.
					
					 A sinister aim sought by the puppet forces was to divert elsewhere the public criticism of them thrown into the quagmire by the development of the murder of private first class Yun, a product of vulnerability of the puppet forces who are no more than cannon fodder for the U.S. war of aggression and corrupt and ailing south Korean society, into the ferry Sewol incident of military version and the occurrence of all sorts of slackened military discipline and scandals shocking the world people.
					
					 Another aim sought by the puppet forces was to cause the KPA to take a countermeasure for self-defence through reckless shelling provocation in the hotspot waters and thus create a pretext for conducting Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises for aggression.
					
					 The prevailing situation is compelling the officers and men of the KPA on the southwestern front to lose the last chance of patience.
					
					 Their hearts are burning with the will to take merciless actions to blow up Paekryong Island, Yonphyong Island, Taechong Island and others where military gangsters are entrenched to use the hotspot waters in the West Sea as a starting point of a war and to send to the bottom of the sea the pirate ships intruding into the inviolable territorial waters of the DPRK.
					
					 It is the southwestern waters where bullets and shells are fired regardless of time, where guiltless fishermen of the DPRK were taken away and hair-raising atrocities were perpetrated against them, and where frequent intrusions into territorial waters of the DPRK are committed.
					
					 The enemies should not forget that artillery pieces of the KPA are waiting for the moment to open fire, keeping the headquarters of provocation within their sight.
					
					 Unshakable is the will of the officers and men of the KPA on the southwestern front to make retaliatory shelling to reduce the provokers' reckless shelling to their final destruction.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should not misunderstand the patience of the KPA officers and men on the southwest front.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a congratulatory message from V. Putin, president of the Russian Federation, on August 12.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend sincere congratulations to you on the occasion of the day of liberation, the national holiday of the Korean people.
					
					 We remember in humble reverence the patriots of Korea and Soviet soldiers who fought shoulder to shoulder for the independence of your country.
					
					 The tradition of friendship and cooperation provided in the annals of the grim war still serves as a foundation for successfully developing the relations between Russia and the DPRK.
					
					 I am sure that the bilateral ties of partnership including large-scale economic and infrastructure projects on the Korean peninsula will continue expanding thanks to our common efforts.
					
					 This is in line with the basic interests of our two peoples and will contribute to ensuring the peace and stability in Northeast Asia.
					
					 I wish you good health and success and all the people of the DPRK happiness and wellbeing.
					
					 Please accept my tribute to you.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Mexican Party Leader
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of greeting from Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, national leader of the Workers' Party of Mexico, on August 5.
					 The message said:
					
					 I am honored to extend the highest respect to the great Comrade Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK, on behalf of all the members of the Workers' Party of Mexico and on my own behalf on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 It is my belief that the revolutionary career of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il and the immortal exploits he performed for the development of the WPK and the DPRK, the freedom and happiness of the Korean people and the accomplishment of the cause of the popular masses for independence will always be remembered by the world progressives, and that the WPK and the Korean people will triumphantly advance the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun, by building a thriving socialist nation under your wise guidance.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I would like to sincerely wish you great success in your responsible work for wisely leading the WPK and the Korean people.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Palestinian President
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, president of the State of Palestine, on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The floral basket was handed over to an official concerned on Wednesday by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Vietnamese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Vietnamese Ambassador
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with Vietnamese Ambassador to the DPRK Le Quang Ba who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.

articles.title: Congratulations to Turkish President-Elect
articles.content:
Congratulations to Turkish President-Elect
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Aug. 12 sent a congratulatory message to Recep Tayyip Erdogan upon his election as president of Turkey.
					 In the belief that the bilateral relations would grow stronger in the common interests and desire of the two peoples, the message wished the president-elect success in the work for the development and prosperity of the country and the promotion of the people's wellbeing.

articles.title: DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Jakarta
articles.content:
DPRK Government Delegation Arrives in Jakarta
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government delegation led by Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong arrived in Jakarta, Indonesia on Tuesday.
					 It was greeted at the airport by the director general for Asia-Pacific and Africa and the director for Protocol of the Foreign Ministry of Indonesia and the DPRK ambassador to Indonesia. 
					
					 On the same day, the delegation left Nay Pyi Taw after visiting Myanmar.

articles.title: Russian Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Russian Delegation Arrives
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia led by Deputy Director Anatoli Kuznetsov arrived here Wednesday.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin gave a reception at his embassy Wednesday on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Present there on invitation were Minister of Railways Jon Kil Su, O Kum Chol, vice-chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Ri Kwang Gun, vice-minister of External Economic Relations, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, Hong So Hon, president of Kim Chaek University of Technology who is chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Parliamentary Group, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Present there were staff members of the Russian embassy and Anatoli Kuznetsov, head of the delegation of the Federal Emigration Bureau of Russia, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visits Arch of Triumph
articles.content:
Members of Pyongyang Mission of AINDF Visits Arch of Triumph
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Chief Jo Il Min and members of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front visited the Arch of Triumph on Wednesday on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea.
					 Being briefed on the Arch of Triumph dealing with the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in liberating the country, they looked around the grand monumental structure.
					
					 At the end of the visit the chief said:
					
					 The President embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years, led the arduous anti-Japanese war to the brilliant victory and thus achieved the historic cause of liberating Korea and ushered in a fresh era of national prosperity.
					
					 The Korean nation will always remember his undying feats.
					
					 The reunification of the country, the lifetime desire of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, will certainly be achieved as the Korean people are holding Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem as the lodestar of national reunification.

articles.title: National Reunification Institute Reveals U.S. Criminal Colonial Rule over S. Korea
articles.content:
National Reunification Institute Reveals U.S. Criminal Colonial Rule over S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute in a memorandum it released Wednesday in the run-up to the 69th anniversary of the liberation of Korea revealed the crimes the U.S. committed by inflicting unbearable misfortune and pain on the south Korean people through its colonial rule.
					 Nearly 70 years covered by south Korea after the liberation of Korea were a history of disgrace in which it has been thoroughly dependent on the U.S. in the political, military, cultural, economic and all other fields with its political sovereignty and the right to existence wantonly violated by the U.S.
					
					 South Korea is a colony of the U.S. with its political sovereignty violated by the U.S., the memorandum said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. is the ruler over south Korea as it has decided everything in south Korea since the liberation of Korea. 
					
					 The south Korean regime was installed according to the will of the U.S. and pro-U.S. stooges who were groomed by the U.S. were elected as "presidents" to faithfully serve the U.S. This is the stark reality in south Korea.
					
					 The puppet regime is unable to exercise the elementary right to sovereignty as it kowtows to the U.S. The relations between the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are master-servant relations, those of domination and subjugation.
					
					 The right to command the armed forces in south Korea has been exercised by the U.S. under brigandish military treaties imposed by the U.S. on south Korea since the south Korean army was organized as a colonial mercenary army.
					
					 After the present conservative regime took power in south Korea, the U.S., by taking advantage of the chief executive's ignorance of the military affairs, pushed the situation in south Korea to the brink of a war and created "insecurity" through various forms of north-targeted war drills in its persistent bid to extend again the transfer of the right to command the wartime operations.
					
					 As a result, the present south Korean chief executive, who committed herself  "not to extend again the transfer of the right to command the wartime operations" during her "presidential campaign" in 2012, could not but stage the farce of imploring the U.S. to extend the right to command the wartime operations, seized by extreme "security uneasiness". Therefore, it was decided shortly ago to extend the transfer to the period after 2020. 
					
					 The memorandum noted that the U.S. employed all sorts of mechanisms, means and methods to turn south Korea into its permanent colony and military base in a bid to realize its ideological and cultural domination over south Korea. It continued:
					
					 The U.S. is distributing anti-DPRK books, publications and literature that preach the corrupt American way of life, Yankee culture in different parts of south Korea. And it is pressurizing the south Korean authorities to reduce the institutional mechanism for limiting the showing of foreign films and screen more U.S. films, claiming that movies are very effective for disseminating the idea of worship towards the U.S. and the American way of life. 
					
					 Owing to the U.S. cunning and vicious ideological and cultural domination, the south Korean people's consciousness of independence and national culture and their beautiful manners and customs were stamped out and the idea of flunkeyism and subjugation and corrupt American culture and way of life are prevalent in the south Korean society.
					
					 Noting that south Korea is a colony totally dependent on U.S. economy, the memorandum went on:
					
					 The south Korean economy has been reduced to an empty one due to the protracted U.S. colonial enslavement policy. It finds itself in such miserable position that it always suffers an acute shortage of raw materials and funds and undergoes marketing difficulties.
					
					 South Korea depends on the U.S. and other foreign countries for 87-100 percent of raw materials and fuel needed for industrial production, for 70 percent of spare parts and materials and for 100 percent of core technology and resource technology for the production of goods.
					
					 Multinational capitals in the U.S. found their ways into south Korea by various forms and methods such as direct investment, indirect investment, loan, technical cooperation and joint bank and are raking up excessive colonial profits, being granted all sorts of special privileges by the puppet forces.
					
					 The puppet forces can never get rid of such miserable plight as colonial stooges and the south Koreans cannot escape disgrace, misfortune and pain as long as the U.S. colonial domination and their sycophancy toward it and treachery persist, the memorandum concluded.

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Presentation Held
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Presentation Held
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of basic science took place at Kim Il Sung University from August 11 to 13 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the  General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and graduate students in the field of basic science.
					
					 Published at the presentation, divided into panels of mathematics, physics, dynamics, laser and geography, were more than 550 papers presented by Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, University of Sciences, the Mathematics Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences and other units.
					
					 Participants introduced the recent successes and experience made in the researches of the field of basic science to make a contribution to building an economic power.
					
					 Papers presented by Kim Il Sung University and Pyongyang University of Mechanical Engineering were highly estimated in the field of mathematics and physics, those by Kim Chaek University of Technology in the field of dynamics, those by the Laser Research Institute in the laser field and those by an institute of the State Academy of Sciences and other units in the field of geography.
					
					 A prize-awarding ceremony took place there.

articles.title: State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals of DPRK
articles.content:
State Academic Degrees, Titles Conferred on Intellectuals of DPRK
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- State academic degrees and titles were conferred on intellectuals of the DPRK who made contributions to building a thriving nation.
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					
					 The title of candidate academician was awarded to Kang In Sik, teacher of Kim Il Sung University, Ko Chol Hun, director of an institute of the Academy of Social Sciences, and Kwon Jae Jong, researcher of the State Science and Technology Commission.
					
					 Professorship went to Yun Jong Chol, researcher of Kim Il Sung University, Song Ye Ok, department head of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University, Kim Sun Myong, director of the Post-graduate Course of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Ri Kwang Il, researcher of Pyongyang Jang Chol Gu University of Commerce, and others.
					
					 Doctorate was awarded to Department Head Pak Jong Ho, teacher Pak Un Sun and researcher Paek Hak Ryong of Kim Il Sung University, Department Head Cha Ki Chol and teacher Jon Ryong Ho of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, Deputy Faculty Dean Ri Pok Gyu, Department Head Hyon Song Chol, Section Chief Kim Pyong Hun, teacher Pak Sang Su and researcher Sin Ok Chol of Kim Chaek University of Technology and others. 
					
					 Assistant professorship went to 148 persons.

articles.title: New Accelerating Agent Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Accelerating Agent Developed in DPRK
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- New accelerating agent was developed in the DPRK. It is made with locally available raw materials and helps accelerate the setting of concrete mixtures.
					 The agent makes it possible to shorten the initial setting and hardening process of concrete mixture. And it is applicable not only to spread concrete for underground and marine structures but also to concrete mixture for quick building operations.
					
					 It has been proved effective in building dams and dwelling houses.

articles.title: Car Riding Group Passes through Different Parts of DPRK
articles.content:
Car Riding Group Passes through Different Parts of DPRK
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Russia-cross Korean Peninsula car riding group passed through different parts of the DPRK. The group is taking part in the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula."
					 The group arrived in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province on Tuesday via Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province and Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 Members of the group visited the Songdowon International Children's Camp and laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il there and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the modern buildings, international friendship children's hall, gymnasium, indoor swimming pool, outdoor playing ground, aquarium, etc.
					
					 They were deeply touched to see the campers enjoying diverse cultural and emotional life.
					
					 The group looked round the area of picturesque Lagoon Samil on the same day.
					
					 It went up to the Kuryong Pool on Mt. Kumgang, world famous mountain, and toured Sea Kumgang and others on Wednesday.

articles.title: Immortal Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for National Liberation
articles.content:
Immortal Feats Performed by Kim Il Sung for National Liberation
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- With the approach of August 15, the anniversary of Korea's liberation from the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, the army and people of the DPRK recollect the undying feats President Kim Il Sung performed for national liberation.
					 Kim Il Sung was a peerless patriot and national liberator who led the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory.
					
					 He set forth the idea that the destiny of the nation and victory in the revolution can be secured only by arms. Based on this idea, he founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, Juche 21 (1932).
					
					 The anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle was a sacred patriotic struggle to defeat the Japanese imperialist aggressors and liberate the country and a fierce revolutionary war against the Japanese aggression forces armed to the teeth.
					
					 Keeping deep in his mind the ardent patriotism and love for the nation, Kim Il Sung led the guerilla warfare against the Japanese imperialists for more than ten years to accomplish the cause of national liberation.
					
					 The undying feats performed by him for national liberation will remain long in the history of the country.

articles.title: Tradition of Revolutionary Comradeship Created by Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Tradition of Revolutionary Comradeship Created by Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The anti-Japanese armed struggle was a bloody revolutionary war conducted by the Korean people under the worst situation.
					 The key to the victory won by the Korean people in the war lay neither in the numerical strength of the army nor in the superiority of military equipment. The victory was entirely attributable to President Kim Il Sung's revolutionary comradeship and the iron-strong unity and cohesion of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA).
					
					 It was in winter of Juche 27 (1938) that the KPRA main unit led by Kim Il Sung was making the Arduous March, fighting against the enemies.
					
					 The unit came to run out of food due to the enemies' long pursuit of it.
					
					 When taking a break, his orderlies offered him a cup of parched-rice flour they had kept for emergency use. But he distributed the flour to the orderlies, leaving nothing for him.
					
					 In the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he made a bold decision to burn the bundles of "Minsaengdan (spy organization formed by the Japanese imperialists)" files to save a lot of KPRA members who were alleged to be accomplices of "Minsaengdan ". 
					
					 One day, Kim Il Sung turned back his way over 40 kilometers of snowdrifts to find a fallen soldier and personally dug up a grave for him.
					
					 When calling at a secret camp, he did not hesitate to inquire after isolated cases of infectious disease.
					
					 Now, the tradition of revolutionary comradeship has been creditably carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It is the firm will of the army and people of the DPRK to accomplish the cause of Songun by dint of comradeship under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Unique Guerrilla Tactics (1)
articles.content:
Unique Guerrilla Tactics (1)
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- During the anti-Japanese revolutionary war, President Kim Il Sung created and employed a wave of unique guerrilla tactics in many battles.
					 In the early period of the war, he led to victory the battle to defend guerilla zones from March 1934 to March 1935.
					
					 The battle was characterized by the close combination of defensive fight and harassment operation behind enemy lines.
					
					 The battle put an end to the siege operation of the enemies, making contributions to the accomplishment of strategic tasks for the first-stage of the anti-Japanese revolutionary war to preserve and train the revolutionary forces including the Korean People's Revolutionary Army and spread and develop the armed struggle.
					
					 At a meeting held in Nanhutou, China in February Juche 25 (1936), Kim Il Sung advanced a strategic line to conduct mobile guerilla activities with large units, a reflection of lawful requirement of the developing Korean revolution in the latter half of 1930s.
					
					 According to this line, the KPRA units carried out many mobile operations like the march into the area of Mt. Paektu, guerilla activities in the southwestern area of Mt. Paektu and advance into the homeland, weakening the strength of the enemy with continued battles. Typical of them is the battle of Pochonbo, which has been well-known over the world.
					
					 In August 1940, he convened the Xiaohaerbaling Meeting at which he set forth the strategic line to conduct small-unit guerilla activities.
					
					 The line made it possible to preserve and further strengthen the revolutionary forces as part of preparations for liberating the country.
					
					 In particular, the final offensive operation for the liberation of the country led by Kim Il Sung was a superb guerilla operation which successfully brought the anti-Japanese revolutionary war to a finish.

articles.title: "Balanced Diplomacy" Touted by S. Korean Authorities Invites Disgrace and Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Balanced Diplomacy" Touted by S. Korean Authorities Invites Disgrace and Destruction: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities talk nonsense that they can play a role in Northeast Asia, pursuant to such diplomatic policy as "balanced diplomacy," hard to implement but it results in inviting disgrace and humiliation, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article. 
					 It cites facts proving that the south Korean authorities' diplomatic policy of pursuing the international cooperation in their efforts to implement a policy of confrontation with the DPRK is throwing them into an evermore bottomless quagmire.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Facts go to prove that the "balanced diplomacy" touted by the puppet authorities can never succeed owing to their total subjugation to the U.S. and the strategic interests of big powers in the region.
					
					 The present crisis the south Korean authorities are facing in their foreign relations is their inevitable fate they have met by prolonging their days through flunkeyism and dependence on outside forces without any clear political philosophy or sovereignty.
					
					 They can never shake off their disgrace and ill fame unless they roll back their country-selling policy of escalating the confrontation with compatriots, backed by outside forces. 
					
					 Dependence on outside forces leads to a final ruin. 
					
					 The only way out for the south Korean authorities is to reject outside forces and independently carve out the destiny of the nation by its concerted efforts. 
					
					 It is the way of protecting the nation's dignity and interests to remain true to the idea of By Our Nation Itself free from the policy of dependence on outside forces and realize the national cooperation, not cooperation with outside forces. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should clearly understand this.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges UNSC to Ensure Impartiality
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges UNSC to Ensure Impartiality
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- In order for the UN Security Council to honorably fulfill its responsibility for world peace and security provided for by the UN Charter it should ensure impartiality in its activities, first of all, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 However, the UNSC seriously lacks this impartiality due to the U.S. application of double-dealing standards.
					
					 Recently, the DPRK, a legitimate member of the UN, proposed the UNSC to handle as an emergency agenda item the U.S. plan to stage the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills disturbing peace and security on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 This is a just demand for internationally taking issue with the U.S. acts of disturbing peace in a bid to periodically strain the situation on the peninsula and ignite the second Korean War, and holding them in check. 
					
					 By turning down the DPRK's proposal the UNSC showed once again that it is behaving without any principle while reading the face of the U.S. applying double-dealing standards.
					
					 If the UNSC is in no position to take issue with U.S. criminal acts as it is its permanent member, it should refrain from deterring self-defensive measures of other countries to foil the U.S. acts.
					
					 However, the UNSC is barred from showing even its possibility. This indicates that what an extreme phase the U.S. has reached in its criminal moves to abuse it.
					
					 From the above-said fact, one can draw a conclusion that the strength to smash the U.S. acts of disturbing peace does not lie in any international body or a big power but in one's own country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Bluffing of S. Korean Defense Minister
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules Bluffing of S. Korean Defense Minister
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet Defense Minister Han Min Gu at a frontline post of the army a few days ago cried out for "resolutely and promptly punishing without hesitation" in case there is a "provocation" from the north. He had blustered before that the north should be aware of the danger to the existence of its social system in case it perpetrates a provocation again.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday ridicules his rhetoric about "punishment" as he is no more than a mere puppet with no ability to exercise the right to command the armed forces which his master is mulling its transfer.
					
					 Han, who is no more than an old, feeble and toothless rabid dog, again gathered his spirit to cry out for "punishment". Lurking behind this is his sinister purpose.
					
					 The recent disclosure of the case of beating private first class Yun to death brought to light the corrupt puppet army kept afloat through violence and club discipline.
					
					 Much upset by the situation getting out of control, the puppet military is making desperate efforts to mislead the public opinion by kicking up the racket for escalating tensions while zealously encouraging its stooges who got depressed.
					
					 Han is a trouble-maker and a root cause of disaster as he brings uneasiness and horror to the south Korean society, being keen on provoking a war of aggression against the north in collusion with outside forces, utterly indifferent to the fate of the people.
					
					 Such wicked warmongers steeped in acts of treachery and confrontation with fellow countrymen should be eliminated as early as possible at whatever price.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not forget that they can meet big disasters due to such idiots as Han who are unable to control their tongues.

articles.title: Social Criticism of "Saenuri Party" Mounts in S. Korea
articles.content:
Social Criticism of "Saenuri Party" Mounts in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Social criticism of the "Saenuri Party" which always employs double-dealing tactics is mounting in south Korea, according to CBS of south Korea on August 10.
					 As the case of the death of a private of the 28th Division of the puppet army caused a social furor, the representative of the "Saenuri Party" openly reprimanded the present defense minister, pounding the table.
					
					 But he claimed that the puppet army chief of staff's clarification of the will to resign is enough to own responsibility in a bid to quench the public demand for holding to account Kim Kwan Jin who was holding the post of the defense minister at a time when the case occurred.
					
					 He even promised to invest the opposition party with the right to recommend a special inspection as regards the institution of the special law for the probe into the truth about ferry Sewol disaster, but he backed out the promise in the long run.
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" turned down the public demand for clarification over seven-hour leave of office by the chief executive at the time of the ferry Sewol disaster, citing "security item", etc.
					
					 Commenting on this, the broadcasting service said this runs counter to the act of the "Saenuri Party" one year ago when it opened to public the minutes of the 2007 south-north summit together with the Intelligence Service, saying that the people have the right to know what the "president" does and says.
					
					 A professor emeritus of Choongang University who once worked as a member of the Emergency Measure Committee of the ruling party said that the recent act of the "Saenuri Party" is just like a flash in the pan and full of antinomy.

articles.title: Institution of Special Law for Probing Truth behind Ferry Sewol Sinking Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Institution of Special Law for Probing Truth behind Ferry Sewol Sinking Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The All-People Measure Council for Sewol Disaster of south Korea held an emergency meeting on situation in Seoul on Monday at which it declared an action demanding the institution of a special law for thoroughly probing the truth about the ferry disaster, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					The organization confirmed that it would stage an all-people rally in Seoul on Friday with the attendance of 100,000 people.
					
					 "Sewol" buses would run across south Korea on the day for ensuring the rally, it held.
					
					 It would expand the bereaved families' hunger sit-in to the people's one, it said, adding that members of labor, academic, legal and religions circles and other citizens would join in the sit-in.
					
					 At the end of the emergency meeting it held a press conference.
					
					 The special law on the ferry Sewol disaster recently agreed upon by the ruling and opposition parties turns down the demand of the bereaved families and other people and fails to invest the fact-finding committee with the independent rights to investigate and indict those responsible for the disaster, it charged.
					
					 It demanded the ruling and opposition parties retract the agreement reached in camera but hold renegotiations.
					
					 It said different circles would fight it out to probe the truth behind the ferry disaster.

articles.title: Candlelight Demo against Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Staged by Organizations of S. Korea, Japan
articles.content:
Candlelight Demo against Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Staged by Organizations of S. Korea, Japan
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Civic organizations of south Korea and Japan staged a candlelight demonstration around the Yasukuni Shrine on August 9 in protest against the visit to the shrine, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The organizations said that the Yasukuni Shrine was served for the political purpose to deny the past history of aggression and beautify the war crimes. 
					
					 They urged the Japanese ministers to stop visiting the shrine where remains of war criminals are entombed.

articles.title: Bulgarian Organization Observes DPRK's Important Day
articles.content:
Bulgarian Organization Observes DPRK's Important Day
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a special bulletin on August 5 on the occasion of the Day of Songun of the DPRK.
					 The bulletin carried the following article:
					
					 The DPRK has celebrated with splendor August 25, the day when leader Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership, as the Day of Songun.
					
					 It was an event of great significance that he visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960.
					
					 He comprehensively embodied the Songun revolutionary leadership on a new high stage in the end of the last century.
					
					 He established the Songun politics as the main political mode of socialism on the basis of the scientific analysis of the prevailing situation.
					
					 He put forward the People's Army as the main force of the revolution and led it to make a breakthrough not only in the defence of the country but in socialist construction.
					
					 His Songun politics brought a great fruition.
					
					 The KPA has grown up to be the army strong in ideology and faith and the invincible combat rank fully prepared for attack and defence. The defence industry of the DPRK has made all ultra-modern arms and equipment.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK in which the whole army and all people are firmly united around the leader, in particular, have been more firmly consolidated.
					
					 And a great turn is taking place in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The DPRK has become a satellite manufacturer and launcher and nuclear weapons state.
					
					 All these achievements are the valuable fruition of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work off Press in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work off Press in Nepal
Pyongyang, August 13 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in booklet by the Nepalese Association for Supporting the Songun Politics on the occasion of the Day of Songun of the DPRK.
					 The talk, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and clarifies tasks to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony was held in Katmandu on August 8.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de viviendas para educadores
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de viviendas para educadores
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, realizo una visita de orientacion sobre el campo de construccion de las viviendas para educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek que entraron en la fase de finalizacion.
					Al mirar el rascacielos en forma de velero, se mostro muy complacido diciendo que este apartamento luce mas elegante una vez azulejeado en su pared exterior y es el edificio que ha reflejado la idea del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar importancia a las ciencias y al personal talentoso y asegurado perfectamente el caracter plastico y el artistico de la arquitectura. Apunto que es otra creacion monumental que demuestra a todo el mundo la arquitectura de la Corea del Songun en constante desarrollo.
					
					Si se pegan a la pared exterior como lo disenado el vidrio de reflexion termica, el edificio se tornara mas vistoso, dijo y agrego esbozando una sonrisa que se le quitan las fatigas acumuladas al pensar que puede  entregar en un futuro cercano a los educadores de la Universidad Politecnica Kim Chaek estas viviendas dignas de jactarse al mundo.
					
					Se entero en detalles del estado de construccion recorriendo el apartamento no.1 del quinto piso del segundo edificio y las instalaciones de servicios, incluyendo la tienda y el restaurante que se acondicionan en la parte abajo del edificio.
					
					En su paso por varias habitaciones como el cuarto de uso conjunto, el cuarto de matrimonio, la cocina y la habitacion de estudio, examino la calidad de ejecucion de la pared y el suelo y la evaluo de alta.
					
					Sera tipico si se convierte en un armario la columna de la entrada arqueada entre el pasillo y la antesala, senalo.
					
					Hay que preparar todas las necesidades de la vida para que los educadores a mudarse a las nuevas viviendas se dediquen a la formacion del personal talentoso y la investigacion cientifica sin ninguna incomodidad, instruyo.
					
					Diciendo satisfecho que se acondicionan bien segun el diseno la tienda, el restaurante y otras instalaciones de servicio, indico que las unidades operadoras de las mismas deben preparar de antemano para que puedan iniciar el servicio desde el momento de inauguracion de las viviendas.
					
					A medida que se acerca el dia de inauguracion de las viviendas, se debe impulsar simultaneamente la creacion de areas verdes y el ordenamiento del contorno, enfatizo.
					
					Estas viviendas son elegantes y si las ve desde el lado opuesto del rio Taedong pareceran mas hermosas, dijo y agrego que se ha levantado en la epoca del PTC este edificio que conviene a la estetica contemporanea y combinan el espiritu Juche, la nacionalidad, la originalidad y el confort.
					
					Evaluo altamente que los constructores militares movilizados en la obra trabajan bien como la unidad de educadores de construccion del pais respondiendo al llamamiento del CC del PTC.
					
					Es un orgullo del PTC y del pais tener la unidad 267 del EPC que termina en el maximo nivel cualitativo y a tiempo cualquier obra asignada por el partido, dijo y subrayo que los militares de la unidad son los jinetes de Chollima de hoy que abren la era de prosperidad de la construccion de una patria prospera acortando el tiempo.
					
					Acompanaron al Mariscal en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Han Kwang Sang, y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres, Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un vuelve a dirigir campo de construccion de hospicio y orfanato
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un vuelve a dirigir campo de construccion de hospicio y orfanato
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, volvio a visitar el campo de construccion del hospicio y el orfanato de Pyongyang.
					Recorriendo varios puntos del campo, se entero en detalles del estado de ejecucion de la obra.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que gracias a los esfuerzos abnegados de los constructores militares, se haya terminado la construccion de armaduras del edificio y marchara en la etapa final la obra interior aunque no paso mucho tiempo desde el inicio de la construccion.
					
					Lo que me gusta en especial en esta construccion es la materializacion consecuente de la orientacion del partido de evitar la repeticion y el dogmatismo y resaltar la originalidad en la arquitectura, dijo.
					
					Es peculiar y elegante los jardines que se acondicionan en el hospicio y el orfanato, dijo y subrayo que las salas de crianza, educacion, diversiones, juegos de inteligencia, tratamiento medico y otras estan distribuidas para el confort de la crianza, la educacion y la vida de los ninos y es muy alta la calidad de ejecucion.
					
					Senalo que la sala de deporte y las piscinas al aire libre y bajo techo se acondicionan conforme a las condiciones de crianza corporal de los ninos y se mostro alegre diciendo que si las construyen los huerfanos los gustarian mucho.
					
					Instruyo adornar el interior de los edificios conforme a la sensibilidad de los ninos.
					
					Enfatizo que se deben construir magnificamente todos los lugares de juego y la vida del hospicio y el orfanato incluyendo el jardin para que estos contribuyan al desarrollo de inteligencia y posesion de correctos rasgos morales de los huerfanos.
					
					Encomendo repetidamente que se deben construir bien estos edificios situados en el lugar adecuado para que se manifiesten el amor del partido por las generaciones venideras, el futuro y la superioridad del regimen socialista de nuestra patria.
					
					Agrego que el proposito del CC del PTC es construir en el futuro en todas las provincias las instalaciones de crianza y educacion como el hospicio y el orfanato de Pyongyang para que los huerfanos crezcan en las mejores condiciones de vida recibiendo la magnifica instruccion.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Han Kwang Sang y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC publica informacion sobre el incidente de fuego artillero
articles.content:
Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del EPC publica informacion sobre el incidente de fuego artillero
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- La Comandancia del Frente Sudoeste del Ejercito Popular de Corea hizo publica el dia 13 la siguiente informacion:
					El dia 12, los gangsteres del circulo militar surcoreano cometieron la grave provocacion militar de disparar indiscriminadamente los proyectiles contra un barco pacifico de nuestra parte que realizaba la pesca rutinaria en el mar sudoeste.
					
					Debido a ese imprudente acto provocador, la situacion de la zona maritima ya delicada llego a la coyuntura a punto de explosion en que no se puede prever nada.
					
					La gravedad del caso esta en que esos piratas cometieron la presente provocacion segun el plan trazado previa y minuciosamente.
					
					5 lanchas rapidas, infiltradas una tras otra en lo profundo de las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC, ejecutaron el indiscriminado canoneo contra nuestro barco pesquero mientras sobrevolaban la zona del incidente los cazabombarderos tipo F-16. Anteriormente, ya se habia decretado el estado de alerta conjunta en las unidades terrestres, maritimas y aereas del ejercito titere surcoreano.
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC conocen de sobra la sucia intencion de los gangsteres militares surcoreanos.
					
					Con el mencionado acto provocador, esos ultimos tratan de distraer la atencion de la opinion publica centrada ahora en el "incidente de asesinato a un soldado bisono de apellido Yun", producto de la vulnerabilidad del ejercito surcoreano, carne de canon para la guerra de agresion de EE.UU., y de la corrupta sociedad surcoreana.
					
					Ellos se encuentran ahora en una situacion tan miserable debido a ese incidente, comparado como "el hundimiento del ferry Sewol sucedido en el circulo militar", y a los sucesivos casos de indisciplina y escandalos en las filas del ejercito.
					
					Igualmente pretenden inducir con la imprudente provocacion de canonazos en las aguas mas cadentes la contramedida autodefensiva del EPC con el fin de preparar un pretexto del desarrollo de los agresivos ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian.
					
					La situacion dada va a romper hasta la ultima cuerda tensa de la paciencia de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC.
					
					Castigar despiadadamente las islas Paekryong, Yonphyong, Taechong, etc. en que estan escondidos los gangsteres de la capa militar titere para tomar las aguas cadentes del Mar Oeste como punto de combustion de la provocacion belica y sepultar en lo profundo del mar los barcos piratas que frecuentan la intrusion en nuestras aguas territoriales sagradas, esto es la incontenible voluntad de represalia de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC.
					
					Precisamente en estas aguas los enemigos libran con frenesi y frecuencia disparos y canonazos, arrastraron a nuestros pesqueros para cometer la barbaridad bestial contra ellos y suelen cometer el acto de intrusion en las aguas territoriales.
					
					No deben olvidar que nuestros canones, apuntando los nidos principales de provocacion, esperan el momento de castigarlos sin piedad.
					
					Es invariable la voluntad de represalia de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC de convertir los imprudentes canonazos de los provocadores en la salva en honor de difunto que anuncia la muerte final.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos no deben juzgar erroneamente la paciencia de los oficiales y soldados del Frente Sudoeste del EPC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un felicita a V. V. Putin por dia de liberacion de Corea
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un felicita a V. V. Putin por dia de liberacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 13 un mensaje de felicitacion al Presidente de la Federacion Rusa, Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 69o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea, envio mi saludo cordial y amistoso a Vd. y, por su conducto, al pueblo ruso.
					
					Hoy dia, se profundizan y se desarrollan sin parar conforme a la aspiracion y deseo de los pueblos de ambos paises la historia y la tradicion de amistad Corea-Rusia, preparadas en el fragor de la severa guerra antijaponesa y continuadas de siglo en siglo.
					
					Convencido de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas en varias esferas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos paises conforme al espiritu de los documentos conjuntos acordados en el maximo nivel, le deseo mayores exitos en sus responsabilidades para construir una Rusia prospera.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores enviado por presidente palestino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores enviado por presidente palestino
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara el Presidente del Estado de Palestina, Mahmoud Abbas, en ocasion del 69o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea (15 de agosto).
					El embajador palestino en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, lo traslado el dia 13 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Alberto Anaya Gutierrez
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que enviara el dia 5 el parlamentario Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, dirigente nacional del Partido del Trabajo de Mexico.
					El remitente rindio maximo homenaje al destinatario en nombre de todos los militantes del PTM y de si mismo con motivo del 54o aniversario del inicio de orientacion sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, eterno Secretario General del PTC.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que brillaran para siempre en el corazon de la humanidad progresista del mundo la vida revolucionaria y proezas del Dirigente acumuladas para el fortalecimiento del PTC y de la RPDC, la libertad y la felicidad del pueblo coreano y la realizacion de la causa de independencia de las masas populares y de que el PTC y el pueblo coreano construiran un Estado prospero socialista y llevaran a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, bajo la sabia direccion del Mariscal.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon que el Mariscal lograra grandes exitos en su trabajo responsable para dirigir sabiamente el PTC y al pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Llega a Yakarta delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
articles.content:
Llega a Yakarta delegacion gubernamental de RPDC
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- La delegacion gubernamental de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el canciller Ri Su Yong llego el dia 12 a Yakarta, capital de la Republica de Indonesia.
					La acogieron en el aeropuerto el director general para Asia-Pacifico y Africa, el director de Protocolo del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Indonesia, y el embajador de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en este pais.
					
					El mismo dia, la delegacion partio de Nay Pyi Taw tras concluir su visita a Myanmar.

articles.title: IRP publica memorando con motivo del 69o aniversario de liberacion de Corea
articles.content:
IRP publica memorando con motivo del 69o aniversario de liberacion de Corea
Pyongyang, 13 de agosto (ACNC) -- En visperas del 69o aniversario de la liberacion de Corea (15 de agosto), el Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publico el dia 13 un memorando para delatar los crimenes de dominacion colonial de Estados Unidos que impuso a los habitantes surcoreanos intolerables desgracias y penalidades.
					Casi 70 anos desde la liberacion de la patria hasta la fecha son la historia ignominiosa en que en el Sur de Corea, totalmente subyugado a Estados Unidos en los dominios politico, militar, cultural y economico, se violaron la soberania politica y el derecho de existencia. 
					
					Adelanta asi el memorando y continua:
					
					El Sur de Corea es la colonia de EE.UU. donde se ve violada la soberania politica.
					
					Despues del 15 de agosto de 1945 hasta la fecha, el verdadero gobernador del Sur de Corea es EE.UU.
					
					Segun la voluntad del imperio, se fabrica el "poder" surcoreano y se eligen como "presidentes" los lacayos proyanquis, esto es la realidad del Sur de Corea.
					
					El poder titere surcoreano se hizo el fantoche de EE.UU. que no ejerce ni la soberania basica, y las relaciones entre EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos son las entre el amo y sus lacayos y las entre el gobernante y el subyugado.
					
					Desde cuando se organizo el ejercito titere surcoreano, grupo de mercenarios coloniales, el mando militar en el Sur de Corea lo ejerce EE.UU. en virtud de los leoninos tratados militares impuestos por el imperio.
					
					Sobre todo, cuando aparecio en el Sur de Corea el actual "poder" conservador, iletrado en los asuntos militares, el amo gringo llevo la situacion del Sur de Corea al borde de guerra con los ejercicios militares conjuntos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y creo la "incertidumbre de seguridad " a fin de dilatar otra vez el traspaso del mando de operaciones en el tiempo de guerra.
					
					Como resultado, presionada por la extremada "incertidumbre de seguridad", la actual mandataria surcoreana, que habia presentado como una de sus promesas de seguridad en las "elecciones presidenciales" "la no reprolongacion del traspaso de dicho mando", se vio obligada a pedir a EE.UU. dilatarlo otra vez.
					
					Por eso, quedo aplazado hace poco para mas alla de 2020 el tiempo de traspaso del mando en cuestion.
					
					EE.UU. domina en lo ideologico y cultural el Sur de Corea movilizando todos los aparatos, medios y metodos con el proposito de convertirlo en su eterna base militar.
					
					EE.UU. divulga por doquier del Sur de Corea los libros de contenido anti-RPDC, las publicaciones que embellecen la corrupta cultura yanqui y el modo de vida al estilo norteamericano. Sobre todo, impone a las autoridades surcoreanas reducir los aparatos institucionales que limitan la proyeccion de filmes extranjeros y a proyectar mas filmes norteamericanos, diciendo que estos son muy eficaces para divulgar la ideologia proyanqui y el estilo de vida norteamericano.
					
					Debido al astuto y barbaro dominio ideologico y cultural de EE.UU., se suprimen la concepcion independiente, la cultura nacional y la original costumbre de los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Evidentemente, el Sur de Corea es la colonia subyugada de punta a cabo a la economia estadounidense.
					
					Como resultado de la prolongada politica de EE.UU. en materia de colonizar y subyugar al Sur de Corea, la economia de este sufre la permanente escasez de materias primas, fondos y ventas.
					
					Ahora el Sur de Corea depende de EE.UU. y otros paises extranjeros el 87-100% de materias primas y combustibles necesarios a la produccion industrial, el 70% de accesorios y materiales y el 100 % de las tecnologias nucleares y de base para la produccion.
					
					Los capitales multinacionales de origen estadounidense se infiltran en el Sur de Corea en diversas formas y metodos como la inversion directa e indirecta, prestamo, cooperacion tecnica, banco comanditario, etc. y sacan superganancias gozando de las prerrogativas de toda indole otorgadas por los titeres surcoreanos.
					
					Mientras continuen el dominio colonial de EE.UU. y los actos serviles proyanquis de los titeres surcoreanos, estos no podran salir nunca de su miserable situacion de lacayos coloniales y la poblacion surcoreana vivira siempre en verguenzas, desgracias y sufrimientos.
